findings.title: Contract doesn't import npm packages from source (like OpenZeppelin etc.)
findings.description: We recommend to import all packages from npm directly without flattening the contract. Functions could be modified or can be susceptible to vulnerabilities.

findings.title: State variable visibility is not set
findings.description: It is best practice to set the visibility of state variables explicitly

findings.title: A floating pragma is set
findings.description: The solidity compiler version is not specified or is too broad, which can lead to unexpected behavior and potential security vulnerabilities.

findings.title: Missing Zero Address Validation (missing-zero-check)
findings.description: The contract does not validate against zero addresses, which can lead to unexpected behavior.

findings.title: Contract's name reused (name-reused)
findings.description: The contract name is reused across multiple files.
